introduce.introduceTwo: Communicate with AI quickly and easily using block-style prompts

quality.noPromptYet: No prompts yet! Create one by dragging and dropping blocks.
quality.progressingPrompt: {{percentage}}% You're on your way to a great prompt!

promptMakingTour.step1: Select a category in the sidebar to see available blocks.
promptMakingTour.step2: Drag blocks from here to the combination area on the right.
promptMakingTour.step3: Drop the dragged blocks into the matching category in the combination area.
promptMakingTour.step4: See how your prompt is built as you arrange the blocks!
promptMakingTour.step5: Once you're done arranging the blocks, click here to save your prompt.

mainTour.step1: Toggle between the prompt list and chat list using this button.
mainTour.step2: See the prompts you've created in this list! Click on a prompt to apply it.
mainTour.step3: You can easily apply prompts with the shortcut [cmd/control + shift + 1]!
mainTour.step4: After applying a prompt, try chatting!
